Loan Calculator
===============

Elementary Financial Mathematics for Loans.

This library provides mathematically grounded Elementary Financial Mathematics
routines like

*   PMT
*   Amortizations Schedules
*   Grossup
*   IRR

    :maxdepth: 3

    Contributing <contributing.rst>
